it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.battlefield

Class TurretBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.battlefield.Block
      • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.battlefield.TurretBlock

  • public class TurretBlock
extends Block
    This class represents all blocks of turret type, which are the blocks that refer to the bonus deck when a grab action occurs

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.battlefield.Block

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Block copy()
      Copies the current block creating a new one constructed with the same initial parameters
      void drop(Weapon weapon)
      Turret blocks do not support the dropping action, so an exception must be thrown

        Class constructor given the position in the board and every BoarderType
        Parameters:
        row - an int representing the row of the block in the board
        column - an int representing the column of the block in the board
        borderNorth - BorderType of the northern border
        borderEast - BorderType of the eastern border
        borderSouth - BorderType of the southern border
        borderWest - BorderType of the western border
